about_the_game:
I currently can't promise that there'll be an English version (for the complete game).


For now, there's only an English demo which covers the beginning of the game and Moran's line. The translation is done by myself and the translation is not beta-ed. You can choose the "VersionEnglish" branch to download the English demo.

Recommend you to check the integrity of game files if you have changed a branch.


I'm having some difficulties in my job, so for some time I probably won't be able to update the English translation. But if you want to give me some advice on grammar mistakes in this game, it's welcomed and please send me an email(1263040030@qq.com).
If you want to help translate this game, you can also email me. However, I'm pretty unwilling to spend more money on this game, so (although I might be willing to give you some kind of reward) the reward won't be much.

Still, thank you very much for visiting this page!

If after auto update, you find bugs, please try uninstall and reinstall the game, thanks.

Because STEAM uses “file mapping rules” to partially update games, it will cause some errors to this game. Please uninstall and reinstall the game if you think the partial update creates bugs.

===

The Game of The Playful is a visual novel created by one person (characters are drew by outsourced artists). The engine used by this game is Visual Novel Maker.
In this visual novel, you'll play as the Heroine and experience twelve individual stories. In each story, you will establish either friendship or romantic relationships with a man. All twelve stories are independent from each other, so you'll be dating with only one person in one story.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains suggested themes. 
The game does not have nude pictures. Suggested themes are discribed in an implicit way.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
I currently can't promise that there'll be an English version (for the complete game).


For now, there's only an English demo which covers the beginning of the game and Moran's line. The translation is done by myself and the translation is not beta-ed. You can choose the "VersionEnglish" branch to download the English demo.

Recommend you to check the integrity of game files if you have changed a branch.


I'm having some difficulties in my job, so for some time I probably won't be able to update the English translation. But if you want to give me some advice on grammar mistakes in this game, it's welcomed and please send me an email(1263040030@qq.com).
If you want to help translate this game, you can also email me. However, I'm pretty unwilling to spend more money on this game, so (although I might be willing to give you some kind of reward) the reward won't be much.

Still, thank you very much for visiting this page!

If after auto update, you find bugs, please try uninstall and reinstall the game, thanks.

Because STEAM uses “file mapping rules” to partially update games, it will cause some errors to this game. Please uninstall and reinstall the game if you think the partial update creates bugs.

name: The Game of The Playful

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: We're very sorry, the English version is currently not available.
  • Additional Notes: please make the window at the front, otherwise the game load will be postponed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: please make the window at the front, otherwise the game load will be postponed

short_description: A single-player otome game with many characters; Players can customize characters' names(including male characters).
